                                            throws io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException

        Helper method to validate the JWT bearer token according to specification.

        Parameters:
        token - the JWT bearer token to validate
        Returns:
        the Claims of the token.
        Throws:
        io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if the token is not valid according to the specification.

      • getPublicKey

        public static java.security.PublicKey getPublicKey()

        Helper method to get the PublicKey instance needed to validate the JWT bearer token.

        Returns:
        he PublicKey instance needed to validate the JWT token, or null if an error occured while converting the key.
